https://tmrev.io/movie/67382-Anthropophagous 2000 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/169Pjyb1VZLWPn1gugr3mewi35M.jpg The millionaire Nikos Karamanlis (Andreas Schnaas) and his family are on a boat trip, when they get into a storm, in which the daughter dies and the yacht sinks. After days without food on a life raft, Nikos needs to eat the corpse of his wife and daughter or die. Later, a group of vacationers arrive at a remote island where Niko had made his home. Now insane and craving flesh, Niko Begins to pick them off, and a few of the survivors try to fight back. Anthropophagous 2000
